data.title: Thunderbird WebDAV Calendar Publishing
data.text:
Sign Up Now!

Help Contents | Previous Page

Our WebDAV Server works with Thunderbird! Share calendars using Mozilla's Thunderbird software with the Lightning Add-On and our WebDAV Calendar Hosting.

Our WebDAV Hosting can be used with Mozilla's Thunderbird to publish .ics files to our WebDAV Server. Updates are automatically published. Calendars can also be viewed with either a public or private (password protected) web site address, which is included with our WebDAV Calendar Hosting accounts.

Instructions: Go to the File men and select New Calendar, or right click in the calendars list and create a New Calendar. Select On the Network. Select the Form iCalendar (ICS) Enter the Publishing URL in the Location field (including the file name) https://webdav.venuecom.com/calendar/YourUserName/calendars/Work.ics. The filename at the end should contain no spaces and end with .ics. Click Continue. Enter a calendar name and click Continue.

The following video illustrates these steps.

Your browser does not support the video tag.
